content: keep baby cozy with this knit blanket that s perfect to warm up the nursery or playroom featuring a classic honeycomb-like pattern created with slip stitches and garter stitch ridges we ve used 4 creamy colors to brighten baby s world pattern is easy to customize for any color scheme making it a great gift option caron one pound is machine washable and dryable so the perfect yarn for this everyday essential pattern includes written instructions and a chart for more visual learners materials size u s 10 6 mm circular knitting needle 36 91 5cm long yarn for model caron® one pound™ 16 oz/453 6 g 812 yds/742 m main color mc off white 10514 1 ball or 655 yds/599 m contrast a soft sage 10580 1 ball or 180 yds/165 m contrast b sunfower 10549 1 ball or 165 yds/151 m contrast c grass green 10620 1 ball or 146 yds/133 m
